無input,return
cat指顯示在螢幕上
為return所以xx是沒有東西的
```{r}
library(lubridate)

now2 <- function(){
  currentDateTime <- Sys.time()
  hh<-hour(currentDateTime)
  mm<-minute(currentDateTime)
  cat("現在是",hh,"點",mm,"分")
}
```
```{r}
now2()
now2() <- xx
xx
```
